item.title: Association contract, section IV
item.description:
You are part of my life on an AT-WILL basis,
and this association may be terminated at any time

0 minute read

item.title: Emotion
item.description:
Where does an emotion go
when it's done with you?

0 minute read

item.title: Lost
item.description:
See, if God had ten people
and then, lost one of them
dropped behind a couch, or somewhere

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Bedtime
item.description:
It's bedtime
because I say it is
and because routine
and predictability
are important components
of stable home life
for a child of three

1 minute read

item.title: Birth
item.description:
Adam's hair
is clean
Eve is
suitably bedraggled
created as she was
from the man's rib,

item.title: Untitled
item.description:
The church made a hole for itself in my heart
and told me that’s where I’d find God
and, often I did

0 minute read

item.title: Kingdoms
item.description:
Jesus wants me for a petty tyrant
to rule and reign
in Israel's house

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Wonder
item.description:
As a child I felt God as a warmth
A love, a comfort

That bearded man of blazing white
who helped me feel so safe at night
has failed to expand
with my expanding

item.title: Blame
item.description:
What if you were told
-- by God himself --
that this boy
was doing the best he can?

1 minute read

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Holy places
item.description:
Stand in holy places, they say
and be not moved.
These places, not those places
you know the ones I mean.

1 minute read

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Rock and Tree
item.description:
The wise man built his house upon a rock
with jack-hammers and hammer-drills
poured concrete and steel i-beams
a surer foundation you’ve never seen
